headline: Realty Income Broadens Reach With Fund Launch And Global Growth Push
summary: Realty Income (NYSE:O) has launched its first perpetual life U.S. Open-End Core Plus Fund, aimed at institutional investors. The company is building a new institutional asset management business alongside this fund initiative. Realty Income has entered a major partnership with Singapore's GIC focused on U.S. logistics developments. The company is also expanding internationally with new activity in Europe and Mexico. Realty Income, trading at $65.99, is best known for its net lease real...
